verses.verse: Yet <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom I have chosen: <S%H977><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> thee, and <S%H3335>formed<s%> thee from the <S%H4480>womb,<s%> <S%H990><s%> which will <S%H5826>help<s%> thee; <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and thou, <S%H3484>Jesurun,<s%> whom I have <S%H977>chosen.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him that is <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> and <S%H5140>floods<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the dry <S%H3004>ground:<s%> I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine offspring: <S%H6631><s%>
And they shall spring <S%H6779>up<s%> as <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H2682>grass,<s%> as <S%H6155>willows<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H2988>courses.<s%>

One <S%H2088><s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD's;<s%> and <S%H2088>another<s%> shall <S%H7121>call<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and <S%H2088>another<s%> shall <S%H3789>subscribe<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3655>surname<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and his <S%H1350>redeemer<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H314>last;<s%> and <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H1107><s%> me there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H4310>who,<s%> as I, shall <S%H7121>call,<s%> and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> it, and set it in <S%H6186>order<s%> for me, since I <S%H4480>appointed<s%> <S%H7760><s%> the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%> and the things that are <S%H857>coming,<s%> and shall <S%H935>come,<s%> let them <S%H5046>show<s%> unto them.

Fear <S%H6342><s%> ye <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be <S%H7297>afraid:<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> I <S%H8085>told<s%> thee from that <S%H4480>time,<s%> <S%H227><s%> and have <S%H5046>declared<s%> it? <S%H859>ye<s%> are even my <S%H5707>witnesses.<s%> Is <S%H3426>there<s%> a <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H1107><s%> me? yea, there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6697>God;<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1077>not<s%> any.

They that <S%H3335>make<s%> a graven <S%H6459>image<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H8414>vanity;<s%> and their delectable <S%H2530>things<s%> shall <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3276>profit;<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> are their own <S%H5707>witnesses;<s%> they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1077>not,<s%> <S%H1077>nor<s%> <S%H3045>know;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> they may be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> hath <S%H3335>formed<s%> a <S%H410>god,<s%> or <S%H5258>molten<s%> a graven <S%H6459>image<s%> that is <S%H3276>profitable<s%> for <S%H1115>nothing?<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2270>fellows<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> and the <S%H2796>workmen,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are of <S%H4480>men:<s%> <S%H120><s%> let them <S%H3605>all<s%> be gathered <S%H6908>together,<s%> let them stand <S%H5975>up;<s%> yet they shall <S%H6342>fear,<s%> and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

The <S%H2796>blacksmith<s%> <S%H1270><s%> with the <S%H4621>tongs<s%> both <S%H6466>worketh<s%> in the <S%H6352>coals,<s%> and <S%H3335>fashioneth<s%> it with <S%H4717>hammers,<s%> and <S%H6466>worketh<s%> it with the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of his <S%H2220>arms:<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> he is <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> and his <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H369>faileth:<s%> he <S%H8354>drinketh<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and is <S%H3286>faint.<s%>

The <S%H2796>carpenter<s%> <S%H6086><s%> stretcheth <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H6957>rule;<s%> he marketh it <S%H8388>out<s%> with a <S%H8279>line;<s%> he <S%H6213>fitteth<s%> it with <S%H4741>planes,<s%> and he marketh it <S%H8388>out<s%> with the <S%H4230>compass,<s%> and <S%H6213>maketh<s%> it after the <S%H8403>figure<s%> of a <S%H376>man,<s%> according to the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of a <S%H120>man;<s%> that it may <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

He heweth him <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H730>cedars,<s%> and <S%H3947>taketh<s%> the <S%H8645>cypress<s%> and the <S%H437>oak,<s%> which he <S%H553>strengtheneth<s%> for himself among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest:<s%> he <S%H5193>planteth<s%> an <S%H766>ash,<s%> and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> doth <S%H1431>nourish<s%> it.

Then shall it <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H1197>burn:<s%> for he will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>thereof,<s%> and <S%H2552>warm<s%> himself; <S%H637>yea,<s%> he <S%H5400>kindleth<s%> it, and <S%H644>baketh<s%> <S%H3899>bread;<s%> <S%H637>yea,<s%> he <S%H6466>maketh<s%> a <S%H410>god,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipeth<s%> it; he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> it a graven <S%H6459>image,<s%> and falleth <S%H5456>down<s%> thereto.

He <S%H8313>burneth<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> thereof <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire;<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> thereof he <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> he <S%H6740>roasteth<s%> <S%H6748>roast,<s%> and is <S%H7646>satisfied:<s%> <S%H637>yea,<s%> he <S%H2552>warmeth<s%> himself, and <S%H559>saith,<s%> <S%H1889>Aha,<s%> I am <S%H2552>warm,<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the fire: <S%H217><s%>

And the <S%H7611>residue<s%> thereof he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> a <S%H410>god,<s%> even his graven <S%H6459>image:<s%> he falleth <S%H5456>down<s%> unto it, and <S%H7812>worshipeth<s%> it, and <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> it, and <S%H559>saith,<s%> <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H410>god.<s%>

They have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H995>understood:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H2902>shut<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that they cannot <S%H4480>see;<s%> <S%H7200><s%> and their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> that they cannot <S%H4480>understand.<s%> <S%H7919><s%>

And <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H7725>considereth<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is there <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H559>say,<s%> I have <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> of it <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire;<s%> <S%H637>yea,<s%> also I have <S%H644>baked<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1513>coals<s%> thereof; I have <S%H6740>roasted<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H398>eaten<s%> it: and shall I <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> thereof an <S%H8441>abomination?<s%> shall I fall <S%H5456>down<s%> to the <S%H944>stock<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree?<s%>

He <S%H7462>feedeth<s%> on <S%H665>ashes:<s%> a <S%H2048>deceived<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath turned him <S%H5186>aside,<s%> that he <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> Is there <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> in my right <S%H3225>hand?<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H428>these,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H5650>servant:<s%> I have <S%H3335>formed<s%> thee; <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H5650>servant:<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5382>forgotten<s%> of me.

I have blotted <S%H4229>out,<s%> as a thick <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> thy <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> and, as a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> thy <S%H2403>sins:<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> thee.

Sing, <S%H7442><s%> O ye <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> it: <S%H7321>shout,<s%> ye lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> ye <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> O <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> therein: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and glorified <S%H6286>himself<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thy <S%H1350>redeemer,<s%> and he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> thee from the <S%H4480>womb,<s%> <S%H990><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things; that stretcheth <S%H5186>forth<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H905>alone;<s%> that spreadeth <S%H7554>abroad<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H854>by<s%> myself;

That <S%H6565>frustrateth<s%> the <S%H226>tokens<s%> of the <S%H907>liars,<s%> and maketh diviners <S%H1984>mad;<s%> <S%H7080><s%> that <S%H7725>turneth<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> men <S%H268>backward,<s%> and maketh their knowledge <S%H5528>foolish;<s%> <S%H1847><s%>

That <S%H6965>confirmeth<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H7999>performeth<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of his <S%H4397>messengers;<s%> that <S%H559>saith<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> Thou shalt be <S%H3427>inhabited;<s%> and to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> Ye shall be <S%H1129>built,<s%> and I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the decayed <S%H2723>places<s%> thereof:
That <S%H559>saith<s%> to the <S%H6683>deep,<s%> Be <S%H2717>dry,<s%> and I will dry <S%H3001>up<s%> thy rivers: <S%H5104><s%>

That <S%H559>saith<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus,<s%> He is my <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and shall <S%H7999>perform<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2656>pleasure:<s%> even <S%H559>saying<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> Thou shalt be <S%H1129>built;<s%> and to the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> Thy foundation shall be <S%H3245>laid.<s%>
